Zeri (Immortal Journey Zeri)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: September 2021

League of Legends is known for its vast array of champions, each with their own unique abilities and captivating stories. One such champion is Zeri, a powerful mage who has recently received a stunning new skin as part of the Immortal Journey collection. The

skin is a testament to Zeri's elegance and grace, showcasing her in a whole new light.

The Immortal Journey Zeri skin is available for purchase in the League of Legends store for 1350 RP. With its release in September 2021, players can now experience Zeri's enchanting presence in a whole new way. This skin not only enhances Zeri's visual appeal but also adds new animations and effects to her abilities, making her gameplay even more immersive.

Details of the Costume

The Immortal Journey Zeri skin transforms Zeri into a celestial being, radiating with ethereal beauty. Her once vibrant blue hair now cascades in shimmering silver, reflecting the light of the moon. She wears an elegant white gown adorned with intricate golden patterns, symbolizing her connection to the heavens. Her staff, once a simple wooden rod, now glows with celestial energy, pulsating with every spell she casts.

Every detail of the Immortal Journey Zeri skin has been meticulously crafted to create a sense of otherworldly elegance. From the delicate embroidery on her gown to the subtle glow of her staff, this skin truly captures the essence of Zeri's celestial power. Whether she's gracefully floating across the battlefield or casting her spells with precision, Zeri's presence is sure to captivate both allies and enemies alike.

Zeri's Story

Zeri, also known as the

is a mage who hails from the celestial realm. Born with a deep connection to the moon's magic, Zeri possesses immense power that she wields with grace and precision. Her abilities allow her to manipulate the moon's energy, casting spells that can both heal and harm.

In the world of League of Legends, Zeri's story is intertwined with the Immortal Journey, a legendary quest undertaken by champions to restore balance to the realms. As part of this journey, Zeri embarks on a mission to protect the celestial realm from dark forces that threaten to consume it. With her mastery of moon magic, she becomes a beacon of hope, guiding her allies and striking fear into the hearts of her enemies.

Zeri's strengths lie in her ability to control the battlefield with her powerful spells. She can heal her allies, granting them the strength to endure even the most intense battles. Additionally, her offensive spells can deal devastating damage to her foes, making her a formidable force to be reckoned with. Her versatility allows her to adapt to various situations, making her an invaluable asset to any team.

However, Zeri also has her weaknesses. Her reliance on moon magic makes her vulnerable to champions who can disrupt her spellcasting or silence her abilities. Additionally, her lack of mobility can make her an easy target for assassins or champions with high burst damage. It is crucial for Zeri players to position themselves strategically and communicate effectively with their team to maximize her potential.

In the world of League of Legends, Zeri has become a beloved champion among players. Her unique playstyle and captivating story have made her a fan favorite. With the release of the Immortal Journey Zeri skin, players now have the opportunity to experience Zeri's celestial power in a whole new way.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Zeri's appearances, including the stunning Immortal Journey Zeri skin. Immerse yourself in Zeri's enchanting world and witness the beauty and power of the Sorceress of the Moon.

Zeri (Default)

Cost: N/A | Release Date: N/A

Zeri, the Enchanter of the Dawngate, is a versatile and enchanting hero in the world of League of Legends. With her captivating abilities and graceful presence, Zeri has become a beloved champion among players. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Zeri's

costume and explore all the intricate details of her appearance.

The Story of Zeri's

Costume

Zeri's

costume is her original and iconic outfit, representing her true essence as an enchantress. Adorned in a flowing robe of vibrant colors, Zeri exudes elegance and mystique. The costume features intricate patterns and delicate embroidery, showcasing her connection to the magical arts. Her long, flowing hair cascades down her back, adding to her ethereal beauty.

The

costume perfectly captures Zeri's enchanting nature, with its harmonious blend of vibrant hues and intricate details. It symbolizes her role as a protector and healer, as well as her deep connection to the mystical forces of the world. Zeri's costume is a testament to her magical prowess and her dedication to maintaining balance and harmony.

Zeri's Story and Abilities

Zeri, also known as the Enchanter of the Dawngate, hails from a realm where magic flows freely. She possesses an innate ability to manipulate and channel magical energies, making her a formidable force on the battlefield. Zeri's primary role is that of a support champion, using her enchanting abilities to heal and protect her allies.

In the game, Zeri's abilities revolve around her mastery of enchantments. Her passive ability,

allows her to enhance her spells by applying additional effects to them. This enables her to provide various forms of utility to her team, such as healing, shielding, and crowd control. Zeri's ultimate ability,

creates a protective barrier around her, granting invulnerability to herself and nearby allies for a short duration.

Zeri's strengths lie in her ability to sustain and protect her team. Her healing abilities can turn the tide of battle, keeping her allies alive in crucial moments. Additionally, her crowd control spells can disrupt enemy movements and provide opportunities for her team to secure kills. Zeri's versatility allows her to adapt to different situations, making her a valuable asset in any team composition.

However, Zeri also has her weaknesses. She is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making her vulnerable to assassins and burst damage champions. Zeri relies heavily on positioning and timing to maximize her effectiveness, as mistimed abilities can leave her and her team exposed. Additionally, her healing abilities have relatively long cooldowns, requiring careful resource management to ensure their availability when needed most.

Zeri's Place in the Game

Zeri's unique playstyle and enchanting abilities make her a popular choice among support players. Her ability to sustain and protect her team makes her a valuable asset in team fights and skirmishes. Zeri's presence in the game adds depth and diversity to the support role, offering players a different playstyle compared to other champions in the same role.

Zeri's

costume is the embodiment of her character and serves as a visual representation of her enchanting abilities. It captures her essence as a protector and healer, showcasing her connection to the magical forces of the world. Whether you choose to play Zeri for her captivating playstyle or her enchanting appearance, she is sure to leave a lasting impression on both allies and enemies alike.

Explore Zeri's Appearances

If you want to learn more about Zeri and her various appearances, including alternate skins and visual updates, you can find detailed information and videos on our dedicated Zeri page. Discover the enchanting world of Zeri and immerse yourself in her captivating abilities and mesmerizing costumes.

Zeri (Withered Rose Zeri)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: October 15, 2014

Withered Rose Zeri is a stunning skin for the enchanting hero Zeri in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on October 15, 2014, and has since captivated players with its unique design and thematic elements. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Withered Rose Zeri and explore all the intricate details of this captivating costume.

The Story of Withered Rose Zeri

Withered Rose Zeri is a skin that tells a tale of beauty and decay. It presents Zeri, the enchantress, in a new light, showcasing her as a withered rose, once vibrant and full of life, now fading away. The skin features Zeri adorned in a tattered, rose-themed outfit, with petals falling around her as she moves. The color palette of the skin is predominantly dark and muted, symbolizing the fading beauty of the rose.

The Withered Rose Zeri skin also introduces new visual effects and animations. Zeri's abilities are transformed to match the theme of the skin, with petals and thorns playing a prominent role. Her Q ability,
now releases a flurry of withered rose petals, while her W ability,
summons thorny vines to ensnare her enemies. The ultimate ability,

creates a swirling vortex of petals, trapping her foes in a mesmerizing display of decay.

Overall, Withered Rose Zeri is a visually stunning skin that adds a touch of melancholy to Zeri's character. It showcases the duality of beauty and decay, reminding players of the fleeting nature of life and the inevitable passage of time.

Zeri: The Enchantress

Zeri, the enchantress, is a support mage in League of Legends known for her ability to heal and protect her allies. She is a gentle and caring soul, always seeking to bring harmony and balance to the world around her. Zeri's past in the game is intertwined with the lore of the Dawngate, a mystical realm where she once resided.

In the game, Zeri's strengths lie in her supportive abilities. She excels at healing her allies and providing shields to protect them from harm. Her Q ability,
allows her to heal and grant movement speed to her allies, while her W ability,
provides a shield that absorbs damage. Zeri's ultimate ability,

is a powerful AoE heal that can turn the tide of team fights.

However, Zeri also has her weaknesses. She is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making her vulnerable to assassins and burst damage champions. Additionally, her healing abilities have relatively long cooldowns, requiring careful timing and positioning to maximize their effectiveness.

In terms of her place in the game, Zeri is often seen as a niche pick in the support role. While she may not be as popular as some other support champions, her unique playstyle and healing abilities make her a valuable asset in certain team compositions. Zeri's ability to sustain her allies and provide utility can be a game-changer in the right hands.

Explore Zeri's Appearances

If you want to learn more about Zeri and her various appearances in League of Legends, you can find detailed information and videos on our dedicated page. Discover the enchanting world of Zeri and witness her transformation with the Withered Rose Zeri skin. Immerse yourself in the captivating story and gameplay of this beloved hero.

Experience the beauty and decay of Withered Rose Zeri and embrace the duality of life. Unleash her healing powers and protect your allies with grace and elegance. Zeri, the enchantress, awaits your command.

Zeri (Ocean Song Zeri)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: June 15, 2021

League of Legends is known for its vast array of champions, each with their own unique abilities and captivating stories. One such champion is Zeri, a support mage who has recently received a stunning new skin called

. This article will delve into the details of this enchanting costume, as well as provide an overview of Zeri's story, strengths, weaknesses, and her place in the game.

The Story of Ocean Song Zeri

Ocean Song Zeri is a skin that transports Zeri into the depths of the ocean, where she becomes a mesmerizing siren. The skin features a beautiful color palette of blues and greens, reminiscent of the ocean waves. Zeri's attire is adorned with intricate seashell and coral designs, giving her a regal and ethereal appearance. Her staff is transformed into a trident, further emphasizing her connection to the sea.

One of the most striking aspects of Ocean Song Zeri is her abilities. Each ability showcases the power of the ocean and its creatures. Her Q ability,
summons a wave of water that crashes onto her enemies, dealing damage and leaving them soaked. Her W ability,
creates a protective shield made of coral, symbolizing the resilience of the ocean's ecosystem. Zeri's E ability,
emits a haunting melody that charms her enemies, forcing them to move towards her. Finally, her ultimate ability,

unleashes a massive whirlpool that engulfs her enemies, dealing damage and slowing them down.

The attention to detail in Ocean Song Zeri is truly remarkable. From the fluid animations to the mesmerizing particle effects, every aspect of the skin immerses players in the enchanting world of the ocean. Whether you're a fan of Zeri or simply appreciate the beauty of the sea, Ocean Song Zeri is a skin that is sure to captivate and delight.

Zeri's Story and Abilities

Zeri, also known as the

is a support mage who hails from the magical city of Maridia. She possesses the ability to manipulate emotions and memories, using her powers to heal and protect her allies. Zeri's past is shrouded in mystery, but it is believed that she was once a renowned poet who sacrificed her voice in exchange for her magical abilities.

In the game, Zeri's strengths lie in her ability to sustain and protect her allies. Her healing abilities, combined with her crowd control and utility, make her a valuable asset in team fights. Zeri's Q ability,
allows her to damage enemies while healing herself and her allies. Her W ability,
can silence enemies and reduce their damage output. Zeri's E ability,
grants her increased movement speed and the ability to pass through units, making her a slippery target. Finally, her ultimate ability,

reveals hidden enemies and provides a shield to her allies.

However, Zeri also has her weaknesses. She is relatively squishy and lacks burst damage compared to other mages. Zeri relies heavily on positioning and timing to maximize her effectiveness. Additionally, her abilities have relatively long cooldowns, making her vulnerable during the downtime.

In the world of League of Legends, Zeri is a champion who excels in providing support and utility to her team. Her unique playstyle and captivating lore make her a favorite among players who enjoy strategic gameplay and intricate storytelling.

Explore Zeri's Appearances

If you're interested in learning more about Zeri and her various appearances, you can find detailed information and videos on her dedicated page. From her classic look to the mesmerizing Ocean Song Zeri skin, you'll discover the many facets of this intriguing champion. Dive into the world of Zeri and experience the magic and wonder that League of Legends has to offer.

Zeri: The Melodic Enchantress

Release Date: November 19, 2013

Within the vibrant and mystical world of League of Legends, there exists a champion who captivates both allies and enemies with her enchanting melodies and ethereal presence. Zeri, known as The Melodic Enchantress, is a support mage who weaves her musical prowess into the very fabric of the game. With her harmonious abilities and captivating backstory, Zeri has become a beloved champion among players.

The Story of Zeri

Zeri's tale begins in the enchanting city of Ionia, a land known for its deep connection to magic and harmony. Born with an innate affinity for music, Zeri was raised in a small village where she honed her skills as a musician and composer. Her melodies had the power to heal, inspire, and even manipulate emotions, making her a revered figure among her people.

However, Zeri's peaceful life took a tragic turn when Noxian forces invaded Ionia. The brutal conflict tore through her village, leaving destruction and despair in its wake. Determined to protect her homeland and use her musical talents for the greater good, Zeri joined the resistance against the Noxian invaders.

During the war, Zeri discovered a hidden power within her music. She could channel her melodies to not only heal wounds but also enhance the abilities of her allies. With her enchanting songs, she became a beacon of hope on the battlefield, inspiring her comrades to fight with renewed vigor.

As the war raged on, Zeri's fame spread throughout Ionia. Her melodies became anthems of resilience and defiance, rallying the people against their oppressors. Her music not only healed physical wounds but also mended the emotional scars left by the war, bringing solace to those who had suffered.

After the war, Zeri dedicated herself to rebuilding her village and restoring the harmony that had been shattered. She traveled across Ionia, using her music to heal the land and its people. Zeri's melodies resonated with the very essence of Ionia, rejuvenating the spirit of the land and fostering a sense of unity among its inhabitants.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Zeri's strengths lie in her ability to provide exceptional utility and support to her team. Her melodic abilities allow her to heal allies, enhance their abilities, and provide crowd control to disrupt enemies. Her kit is designed to keep her allies alive and empower them to achieve victory.

One of Zeri's primary strengths is her healing ability. Through her melodies, she can restore health to her allies, ensuring their survival during intense battles. This makes her an invaluable asset in team fights and skirmishes, as she can turn the tide of battle with a well-timed heal.

In addition to healing, Zeri possesses the power to enhance her allies' abilities. By harmonizing with her teammates, she can amplify their damage output, increase their movement speed, or grant them temporary invulnerability. These enhancements can be game-changing, allowing her allies to secure kills or escape dangerous situations.

Furthermore, Zeri's crowd control abilities make her a formidable force on the battlefield. She can silence enemies, preventing them from casting spells, or immobilize them with her enchanting melodies. This disruption can turn the tide of team fights, giving her team a significant advantage.

However, Zeri does have her weaknesses. As a support mage, she relies heavily on her teammates to deal damage. While she can enhance their abilities, she lacks the raw damage output of other champions. Additionally, her healing abilities have a cooldown, so timing and resource management are crucial for maximizing her effectiveness.

Furthermore, Zeri's squishy nature makes her vulnerable to assassins and burst damage champions. She must position herself carefully in team fights to avoid being targeted and eliminated early on. Communication and coordination with her team are essential to ensure her survival and maximize her impact.

Zeri's Place in the Game

Zeri's unique playstyle and supportive nature make her a valuable addition to any team composition. Her healing and utility abilities make her an excellent choice for protecting and empowering carries, ensuring their survival and enabling them to carry the game.

Her crowd control abilities also make her a strong pick for engaging or disengaging team fights. By silencing key enemy champions or immobilizing threats, she can create opportunities for her team to secure kills or escape dangerous situations.

Furthermore, Zeri's thematic design and captivating backstory make her a fan-favorite among players. Her melodic abilities and enchanting presence add a touch of magic and elegance to the game, resonating with those who appreciate the artistic aspects of League of Legends.

On the website developed for the League of Legends game, you can access information and videos of all of Zeri's skins. Each skin offers a unique visual and auditory experience, further enhancing the enchanting nature of the champion. From the celestial-themed
to the hauntingly beautiful

each skin adds a new layer of depth to Zeri's character.

In conclusion, Zeri, The Melodic Enchantress, brings a harmonious blend of healing, utility, and crowd control to the world of League of Legends. With her captivating melodies and inspiring backstory, she has become a beloved champion among players. Whether she is healing wounds, empowering her allies, or disrupting enemies with her enchanting melodies, Zeri's presence on the battlefield is truly magical.
